=== About me ===
I am Shashank Sahni. I am a Computer Science student pursuing my Btech from IIIT Hyderabad, currently in 4th year. I started using Linux about 3 years ago and since then I have used Fedora, RedHat, Slackware and now Ubuntu.<<BR>>
<<BR>>
I am fond of Linux and Internet, can't imagine a day without any of them. I love basketball, haven't played for the last 4 months coz of injury, hoping to get back on the court soon.
